|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz |cpu2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6368;BCM6368KPBG; |cpu2_cores = 2 |cpu2_type = |cpu2_type_rev = |cpu2spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = STMicro;NAND01GW3B2CZA6; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = |flash2type = |fla2_num = |fla2chip = |flash2size = |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G83EFA; |ram1_num = 4 |ram2type = |ram2type1 = |ram2spd = |ram2size = 32 |ram2chip = Nanya;NT5DS16M16DS-5T; |ram2_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6161;88E6161-LG02; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = F4:CA:E5 |oui = F4:CA:E5 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA, SFP |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, Femtocell, Fiber Optic Link |addchip = SFP Port GbE Switch/Transceiver;Marvell;88E1118R;Alaska;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 01/2011 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cameo WLX-0205 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8366;88W8366-BDK2; |rad1chip2 = Marvell;88W8063; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450/450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== It succeed to the ''Freebox 5'' (last released in 2008). {{See also|Freebox Crystal 1 F-ADSL05R}} This box has a empty area designed to receive a (optionnal) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Femtocell Femtocell] adapter. *[https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freebox ''Freebox 6 (Revolution)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] (FR) :Server: CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 / [[Broadcom]] BCM6368; Memory: 128MB/512+32MB :Player: CPU: [[Intel Atom]] CE4150 @1.2GHz / Intel GMA 500; Memory: 256MB/1GB *[https://h-node.org/wifi/view/en/1963/Marvell-Technology-Group-Ltd--88W8366--TopDog--802-11n-Wireless Marvell 88W8366 (TopDog) 802.11n Wireless Adapter] :[[Marvell]] 88W8366 [11ab:2a43] 
lspci
Ethernet controller: Marvell 88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless

lspci -vmmnn
Vendor:	Marvell Technology Group Ltd. [11ab]
Device:	88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [2a43]
SVendor:	Marvell Technology Group Ltd. [11ab]
SDevice:	88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [2a43]

lspci -nnk
Ethernet controller: Marvell 88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [11ab:2a43]
	Subsystem: Marvell 88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [11ab:2a43]
	Kernel modules: mwl8k
==Pictures==
'''User Images''' Missing picture : HDD (SATA 2,5" 320GB), removed because it is fixed over the motherboard. File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A Main board with all heat sinks.jpg|Main board File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A Main board 1st heat sink.jpg|RAM, CPU (NAS), Flash File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A CPU.jpg|CPU (ADSL) File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A. Board Wifi.jpg|Wi-Fi card File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A Main board 2nd heat sink.jpg|Board File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A Main board 3rd heat sink.jpg|Switch File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A RAM chip.jpg|RAM (ADSL) File:Freebox 6 Revolution F-GW06250A Sticker inside.jpg|Sticker
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ===Models=== *Freebox V1 (2002): [[IDT]] 79RC32355 @180MHz *Freebox V2 (2003): [[IDT]] 79RC32355 @180MHz *Freebox V3 (2004): [[Conexant]] CX82310 @168MHz *Freebox V4 (2004): [[Broadcom]] BCM6348 @256MHz *Freebox V5 «HD» (2006): [[Sigma Designs]] SMP8635 @300MHz *Freebox Ô (2007): [[Sigma Designs]] SMP8635 @300MHz *Freebox V6 «Revolution» (2010): [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz *Freebox V5 «Crystal» 1/2 (2013): [[Broadcom]] BCM6348 @256MHz *Freebox V6 «Mini 4K» (2015): [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz *Freebox V7 «One» (2018): [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz *Freebox V7 «Delta» (2018): [[Marvell]] 8040 Armada SoC *Freebox V8 «Pop» (2020): [[Marvell]] 8040 Armada SoC ===Disassemble=== Very hard because there is no screws outside, do look at the videos on Youtube :(need 2 knifes or blades in order to disable the 2 clips, those clips are :designed to plug the black external cover box to the red internal box). [[Category:English Documentation]]
